item.title: Netflix Addresses Gabby Petito AI Voice Recreation For ‘American Murder’
item.description: In American Murder: Gabby Petito, Netflix used AI to recreate her voice to read texts and letters, sparking debate about its use.

item.title: Agents And Compliance—Can They Ever Get Along?
item.description: AI agents are replacing tasks performed by humans, so they need to be regulated in the same way as humans.

item.title: GOP Could Fund Tax Cuts And End High-Skilled Immigration Backlog
item.description: House and Senate Republicans looking to pay for tax cuts and other GOP priorities could turn to highly skilled immigrants.

item.title: ‘Severance’ Season 2 Just Set A New Record For Apple TV+
item.description: According to Apple, season 1 and this half of season 2 of Severance have now just set a record for the entire streaming service.

item.title: The Necessity For A Multi-Stratum Approach To Quantum Computation
item.description: It's necessary to explore multiple computational strata—including those yet to be discovered—that will underpin the creation of diverse quantum techno...
